about.heading: About Me
about.text: I am a software engineer living in Canberra Australia. I have 3 years work experience in software industry, and have been involved in small and major client projects. I am a proficient backend and javascript developer. My current projects include engineering and builiding web and mobile applications with laravel, react and react-native.

experience.text: Planning, developing and maintaining major client projects for 372 Digital. Also involved in mentoring junior developers and working closely with management in establishing software engineering and standard operating procedures.
Working with project team and developing backend applications as according to the client requirements. Giving suggestions and inputs to the team lead on specifics of certain requirements.

project.title: Cimara Workforce Management
project.text: Responsible Planning, developing and maintaining Cimara workfore management system. Establishing requirements and scheduling release timeline with client. Guiding junior developer on project.

project.title: Canberra Ellite Taxi
project.text: Developed backend API for CET web app using smartmove taxi API. Responsibe for maintaing the backend infrastructure and react CET booking application.

project.title: National Centre for Australian Children's Literature Book Database
project.text: Developed book database which hopes to make it easier for teachers, parents, and readers to find books which celebrate diversity. https://www.sbs.com.au/news/database-connects-kids-with-culturally-diverse-children-s-books

project.title: Catholic Education School Portal
project.text: Developed school journal portal for the Catholic education. The application helps different school to post their journal which can be accessed by the students and the community.
